anya-e0805n1:2_0: Atthābhimukhaṁ namanato, attani catthassa nāmanato nāmaṁ, dabbābhidhānaṁ.
anya-e0805n1:3_1: tividhaṁ pumitthinapuṁsakaliṅgavasena. Yathā – rukkho, mālā, dhanaṁ.
anya-e0805n1:4_0: Catubbidhaṁ sāmaññaguṇakriyāyadicchāvasena, yathā – rukkho, nīlo, pācako, sirivaḍḍhotiādi.
anya-e0805n1:7_0: Tattha paṭhamaṁ akārantamhā pulliṅgā jātinimittā purisasaddā syādivibhattiyo parā yojīyante.
anya-e0805n1:9_1: Tattha pañca māre jitavāti jino, buddho.
anya-e0805n1:9_4: tepiṭakassa buddhavacanassa māgadhikāya sabhāvaniruttiyā yuttaṁ anurūpamevāti idaṁ adhikāratthaṁ veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0805n1:15_2: tathā tathā idha liṅgaṁ nipaccate ṭhapīyati.
anya-e0805n1:15_3: Casaddena dhātavo cāti jinavacanānurūpato ‘‘purisa’’iti liṅge ṭhapite tato tassa dhātuppaccayavibhattivajjitassa
anya-e0805n1:18_0: Tato jinavacanayuttehi liṅgehi parā vibhattiyo honti.
anya-e0805n1:19_0: Kā ca pana tā vibhattiyo? ‘‘Vibhattiyo’’ti adhikāro.
anya-e0805n1:20_0: 63.Siyo, aṁyo, nāhi, sanaṁ, smāhi, sanaṁ, smiṁsu.
anya-e0805n1:23_3: itarathā purimasutte casaddena saññākaraṇe appakataniratthakavidhippasaṅgo siyā.
anya-e0805n1:24_2: Idha pana padanipphādanampi jinavacanassāvirodhenāti ñāpetuṁ paribhāsantaramāha.
anya-e0805n1:26_0: Yathā yathā tesaṁ jinavacanānaṁ uparodho na hoti,
anya-e0805n1:26_4: Teneva idha ca ākhyāte ca dvivacanāggahaṇaṁ,
anya-e0805n1:29_1: Tatthāpi aniyamenekavacanabahuvacanappasaṅge ‘‘ekamhī vattabbe ekavacana’’nti paribhāsato liṅgatthassekattavacanicchāyaṁ paṭhamekavacanaṁ si.
anya-e0805n1:32_0: Si, oiti dvipadamidaṁ. Liṅgassa akārato parassa sivacanassa okāro hoti.
anya-e0805n1:33_0: Suttesu hi paṭhamāniddiṭṭhassa kāriyino chaṭṭhīvipariṇāmena vivaraṇaṁ ādesāpekkhanti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0805n1:34_0: Ettha ca sīti vibhatti gayhate vibhattikāriyavidhippakaraṇato,
anya-e0805n1:34_2: evaṁ sabbattha syādīnaṁ kāriyavidhāne vibhattiyevāti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0805n1:35_0: ‘‘Vā paro asarūpā’’ti paralope sampatte tadapavādena pubbalopamāha.
anya-e0805n1:37_2: saralope kate tu parasarassa pakatibhāvo hoti.
anya-e0805n1:37_3: Ettha ca ‘‘saralope’’ti punaggahaṇaṁ imināva katasaralopanimitteyeva parassa vikāre sampatte pakatibhāvatthaṁ.
anya-e0805n1:37_4: Parasarassa pakatibhāvavidhānasāmatthiyato amādesappaccayādibhūte sare paretipi siddhaṁ.
anya-e0805n1:43_0: Puriso ca puriso cāti purisa purisaiti vattabbe –
anya-e0805n1:45_0: Sarūpānaṁ samānarūpānaṁ padabyañjanānaṁ majjhe ekova sissate,
anya-e0805n1:45_2: Ettha ca ‘‘sarūpāna’’nti vuttattāva siddhe asakimpayoge punāsakiṁgahaṇaṁ ekavibhattivisayānamevāsakimpayoge evāyanti dassanatthaṁ,
anya-e0805n1:45_4: ‘‘Vaggā pañcapañcaso mantā’’ti ettha ‘‘pañcapañcaso’’ti niddeseneva vicchāpayogasiddhiyā ñāpitattā,
anya-e0805n1:48_0: Tattheva liṅgatthassa bahuttavacanicchāyaṁ ‘‘bahumhi vattabbe bahuvacana’’nti paṭhamābahuvacanaṁ yo,
anya-e0805n1:50_1: dutiyāyonīnañca yayākkamaṁ ākārekārādesā honti vāti ākāro,
anya-e0805n1:51_0: Vā icceva rūpā rūpāni, aggayo, munayo.
anya-e0805n1:54_0: Asantaṁ jhe katatte tu, vidhiṁ dīpeti vāsuti.
anya-e0805n1:57_2: Tasmiṁ ālapanatthādhike liṅgatthābhidhānamatte ca paṭhamāvibhatti hoti.
anya-e0805n1:60_0: Ālapanatthe vihito si gasañño hotīti gasaññāyaṁ ‘‘bho ge tū’’ti ito ‘‘ge’’ti vattate.
anya-e0805n1:62_0: Liṅgassa sambandhī akāro ca pitusatthuiccevamādīnamanto ca ākārattamāpajjate ge pare.
anya-e0805n1:65_0: Liṅgassa sambandhī ākāro rassamāpajjate ge pare vikappena, adūraṭṭhassālapanevāyaṁ.
anya-e0805n1:67_2: ghate cā’’ti evamādīhi niddiṭṭhehi añño seso nāma,
anya-e0805n1:67_5: ettha ca satipi siggahaṇe vaiti vacanameva ñāpakamaññatthāpi siggahaṇe ālapanāggahaṇassa.
anya-e0805n1:67_6: Keci ālapanābhibyattiyā bhavantasaddaṁ vā hesaddaṁ vā payujjante.
anya-e0805n1:68_0: Bahuvacane na viseso, bhavanto purisā tiṭṭhatha.
anya-e0805n1:71_0: Yaṁ vā karoti, yaṁ vā vikaroti, yaṁ vā pāpuṇāti, taṁ kārakaṁ kriyānimittaṁ kammasaññaṁ hoti.
anya-e0805n1:73_2: ‘‘saralopo’’tiādinā sare lutte ‘‘dīgha’’nti dīghe sampatte pakatibhāvo ca,
anya-e0805n1:77_0: Yo attappadhāno kriyaṁ karoti, so kattusañño hoti.
anya-e0805n1:80_0: Kattari ca kārake tatiyāvibhatti hotīti tatiyekavacanaṁ nā.
anya-e0805n1:82_1: Akārantato liṅgamhā parassa nāvacanassa enādeso hoti,
anya-e0805n1:85_0: Su, hiiccetesu vibhattirūpesu paresu liṅgassa sambandhī akāro ettamāpajjate.
anya-e0805n1:87_0: Sabbato liṅgamhā smā hi smiṁiccetesaṁ yathākkamaṁ mhā, bhi,
anya-e0805n1:90_0: Yena vā kayirate, yena vā passati, yena vā suṇāti, taṁ kārakaṁ karaṇasaññaṁ hoti.
anya-e0805n1:92_2: āviṭṭhena purisena so puññaṁ karoti, purisehi,
anya-e0805n1:95_0: Yassa vā dātukāmo, yassa vā rocate, yassa vā dhārayate, taṁ kārakaṁ sampadānasaññaṁ hoti.
anya-e0805n1:97_0: Sampadānakārake catutthīvibhatti hotīti catutthiyā ekavacanaṁ sa.
anya-e0805n1:99_0: Sabbato liṅgamhā sakārāgamo hoti se vibhattimhi pare. Purisassa dhanaṁ dadāti.
anya-e0805n1:102_0: Su naṁ hiiccetesu paresu liṅgassa antabhūtā sabbe rassasarā dīghamāpajjante,
anya-e0805n1:105_0: Yasmā vā avadhibhūtā apeti, yasmā vā bhayaṁ, yasmā vā ādatte, taṁ kārakaṁ apādānasaññaṁ hoti.
anya-e0805n1:107_0: Apādānakārake pañcamīvibhatti hotīti pañcamiyā ekavacanaṁ smā.
anya-e0805n1:110_0: Akārantato liṅgamhā sabbesaṁ smā smiṁiccetesaṁ yathākkamaṁ ākārekārādesā honti vā,
anya-e0805n1:111_0: Bahuvacane sabbattha tatiyāsamaṁ, hissa bhiādeso hoti. Purisehi, purisebhi apeti.
anya-e0805n1:114_0: Yassa vā pariggaho, taṁ sāmisaññaṁ hoti.
anya-e0805n1:116_1: Ṭhapetvā āyādesaṁ sabbattha catutthīchaṭṭhīnaṁ samānaṁ rūpaṁ.
anya-e0805n1:119_0: Yo kattukammānaṁ kriyāya ādhāro, taṁ kārakaṁ okāsasaññaṁ hoti.
anya-e0805n1:121_0: Okāsakārake sattamīvibhatti hotīti sattamiyā ekavacanaṁ smiṁ,
anya-e0805n1:129_0: Āloka loka nilayā’nila cāga yogā, vāyāma gāma
anya-e0805n1:132_0: Sārambha thambha mada māna pamāda makkhā.
anya-e0805n1:138_0: Manogaṇādissa tu nāsasmāsmiṁsu viseso. Aññattha purisasamaṁ.
anya-e0805n1:139_0: Mano, manā, he mana he manā vā, bhavanto manā, manaṁ, mane.
anya-e0805n1:145_0: Eteheva manogaṇādīhi sare pare sāgamo hoti vā. Manasā, manena.
anya-e0805n1:146_1: tena ‘‘mano manā manaṁ mane manaāyatana’’ntiādīsu na hoti.
anya-e0805n1:149_0: Manogaṇādito parassa sassa vibhattissa okāro hoti vā. Sāgamo.
anya-e0805n1:159_0: Sabbasseva ntupaccayassa savibhattissa āādeso hoti simhi vibhattimhi. Guṇavā.
anya-e0805n1:162_0: Sabbasseva ntupaccayassa savibhattissa ntoādeso hoti vā yomhi paṭhame, guṇavanto tiṭṭhanti.
anya-e0805n1:165_0: Ntupaccayassa anto ukāro attamāpajjate sunaṁhi yoiccetesu,
anya-e0805n1:165_1: caggahaṇena aññesu aṁ nā smāsmiṁsu ca.
anya-e0805n1:165_3: chaṭṭhiyā siddhepi antādese puna antaggahaṇakaraṇato yonaṁ ikāro ca kvaci.
anya-e0805n1:168_0: Sabbasseva ntupaccayassa savibhattissa aṁ avaṇṇaiccete ādesā honti ge pare.
anya-e0805n1:169_0: Bho guṇavaṁ bho guṇava bho guṇavā, bhavanto guṇavanto guṇavantā, guṇavantaṁ, guṇavante.
anya-e0805n1:172_0: Sabbasseva ntupaccayassa savibhattissa toti tāādesā honti vā sasmiṁnāiccetesu yathāsaṅkhyaṁ.
anya-e0805n1:174_0: Sabbasseva ntupaccayassa savibhattissa ntassaiccayamādeso hoti vā se vibhattimhi.
anya-e0805n1:176_0: Sabbasseva ntupaccayassa savibhattissa taṁādeso hoti vā naṁmhi vibhattimhi. Guṇavataṁ guṇavantānaṁ.
anya-e0805n1:179_0: Evaṁ gaṇavā kulavā balavā yasavā dhanavā sutavā bhagavā himavā phalavā sīlavā paññavā iccādayo.
anya-e0805n1:183_0: Ntupaccayassa anto attaṁ hoti vā simhi vibhattimhi. Himavanto, himavā, sesaṁ samaṁ.
anya-e0805n1:185_0: Evaṁ satimā dhitimā gatimā matimā mutimā muttimā jutimā sirimā hirimā thutimā ratimā yatimā sucimā kalimā
anya-e0805n1:185_1: balimā kasimā rucimā buddhimā cakkhumā bandhumā hetumā setumā ketumā rāhumā bhāṇumā khāṇumā vijjumā iccādayo.
anya-e0805n1:186_0: Tattha satimantu bandhumantusaddānaṁ aṁsesu rūpabhedo. ‘‘Attaṁ, ntussā’’ti ca vattate.
anya-e0805n1:188_0: Sabbasseva ntupaccayassa attaṁ hoti vā aṁsaiccetesu.
anya-e0805n1:192_0: Gacchanticcevamādīnaṁ antappaccayantānaṁ ntasaddo aṁrūpaṁ āpajjate vā simhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0805n1:195_0: Gacchantādīnaṁ ntasaddo ntupaccayova daṭṭhabbo sesesu vibhattippaccayesu,
anya-e0805n1:196_1: bho gacchaṁ bho gaccha bho gacchā,
anya-e0805n1:197_0: Evaṁ mahaṁ caraṁ tiṭṭhaṁ, dadaṁ bhuñjaṁ suṇaṁ pacaṁ;
anya-e0805n1:198_0: Jayaṁ jīraṁ cavaṁ mīyaṁ, saraṁ kubbaṁ japaṁ vajaṁ –
anya-e0805n1:200_0: Bhavantasaddassa ga yo nā savacanesu viseso. So bhavaṁ.
anya-e0805n1:203_0: Bhavantaiccetassa vakārassa obhāvo hoti kvaci yoiccetesu. Te bhonto bhavanto bhavantā.
anya-e0805n1:206_0: Sabbasseva bhavantasaddassa bho hoti ge pare.
anya-e0805n1:208_0: Bhotā bhavatā bhavantena, bhoto bhavato bhavantassa iccādi.
anya-e0805n1:210_0: Sabbasseva bhadantasaddassa bhaddanta bhanteiccete ādesā honti kvaci ge pare yosu ca.
anya-e0805n1:212_0: Sabbasseva santasaddassa sasaddādeso hoti bhakāre pare, ante ca bakārāgamo hoti.
anya-e0805n1:213_0: Casaddaggahaṇena abhakārepi samāse kvaci sakārādeso. Sabbhi.
anya-e0805n1:215_0: Atthi rāja brahma atta sakhasaddādīnaṁ bhedo, tatheva syādyuppatti, ‘‘rāja si’’iti ṭhite –
anya-e0805n1:218_0: Brahma atta sakha rājaiccevamādito sivacanassa ākāro hoti.
anya-e0805n1:220_0: Brahmattasakharājādito yonaṁ ānoādeso hoti. Rājāno tiṭṭhanti, bho rāja bho rājā, bhavanto rājāno.
anya-e0805n1:223_0: Brahmādīhi parassa aṁvacanassa ānaṁ hoti vā. Rājānaṁ passa rājaṁ vā, rājāno.
anya-e0805n1:226_0: Sabbasseva rājasaddassa savibhattissa raññāādeso hoti vā nāmhi vibhattimhi. Raññā kataṁ rājena vā.
anya-e0805n1:228_0: Sabbassa rājasaddassa rājuādeso hoti su naṁ hiiccetesu vacanesu.
anya-e0805n1:231_0: Sabbasseva rājasaddassa savibhattissa rañño rājinoiccete ādesā honti se vibhattimhi. Rañño,
anya-e0805n1:234_0: Sabbasseva rājasaddassa savibhattissa raññaṁādeso hoti vā naṁmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0805n1:241_0: Tatrāyaṁ brahmattasakhādīsu pāṭhasāmatthiyato rūpātideso. Sesaṁ tatiyāsamaṁ.
anya-e0805n1:242_0: Raññā apeti, rājūhi rājūbhi, rājehi rājebhi, rañño, rājino santakaṁ, raññaṁ rājūnaṁ rājānaṁ.
anya-e0805n1:245_0: Sabbasseva rājasaddassa savibhattissa raññerājiniiccete ādesā honti smiṁmhi vibhattimhi. Raññe,
anya-e0805n1:246_0: Brahmasaddassa ca ga nā sa smiṁsu viseso. Brahmā, brahmāno.
anya-e0805n1:252_0: Brahmasaddassa anto uttamāpajjate sa nāiccetesu vacanesu.
anya-e0805n1:255_0: Jhalasaññehi ivaṇṇuvaṇṇehi parassa saiccetassa vacanassa noiccādeso hoti vā.
anya-e0805n1:256_0: Pañcamiyaṁ nābhāvātideso. Brahmunā, brahmehi brahmebhi, brahmuno brahmassa, brahmānaṁ brahmūnaṁ vā.
anya-e0805n1:258_0: Brahmasaddato smiṁvacanassa ni hoti. Tusaddena kammacammamuddhādito ca kvaci. Brahmani, brahmesu.
anya-e0805n1:260_0: Attā, attāno, bho atta bho attā, bhavanto attāno, attānaṁ attaṁ, attāno.
anya-e0805n1:261_0: Nāmhi ‘‘akammantassa cā’’ti ettha casaddena attantassa attaṁ vā. Attanā attena vā.
anya-e0805n1:263_0: Attasaddassa anto anattamāpajjate hismiṁ pare. Attanehi attanebhi.
anya-e0805n1:266_0: Tato attasaddato sassa vibhattissa no hoti. Attano, attānaṁ.
anya-e0805n1:268_0: Tato attasaddato smāvacanassa nā hoti. Attanā apeti.
anya-e0805n1:269_0: Nābhāvātideseneva siddhepi uttarasuttena ekayogamakatvā bhinnayogakaraṇaṁ atthantaraviññāpanatthaṁ,
anya-e0805n1:272_0: Tato attasaddato smiṁvacanassa ni hoti. Attani, attesu.
anya-e0805n1:276_0: Sakhasaddato yonaṁ āyo noādesā ca honti. Sakhāyo.
anya-e0805n1:278_0: Sakhasaddantassa ikārādeso hoti nonānaṁsaiccetesu paresu. Sakhino tiṭṭhanti.
anya-e0805n1:281_0: Sakhato gassa akāra ākāra ikāra īkāraekārādesā honti.
anya-e0805n1:282_0: A ca ā ca i ca ī ca e cātipi e, pubbassarānaṁ kamena lopo.
anya-e0805n1:283_0: Bho sakha bho sakhā bho sakhi bho sakhī bho sakhe, bhavanto sakhāno sakhāyo sakhino.
anya-e0805n1:286_0: Sakhantassa āro bhoti vā sunaṁ aṁiccetesu paresu.
anya-e0805n1:289_0: Sakhantassa āro hoti vā himhi vibhattimhi. Sakhārehi sakhārebhi, sakhehi sakhebhi.
anya-e0805n1:290_0: Ikārādese ‘‘jhalato sassa no vā’’ti no. Sakhino sakhissa, sakhārānaṁ sakhīnaṁ.
anya-e0805n1:294_0: Sakhato smiṁvacanassa ekāro hoti. Niccatthoyamārambho. Sakhe, sakhāresu sakhesu.
anya-e0805n1:295_0: Ātumasaddassa paṭhamādutiyāsu attasaddasseva rūpanayo. Ātumā, ātumāno,
anya-e0805n1:299_0: Pumasaddassa savibhattissa ākārādeso hoti simhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0805n1:302_0: Pumantassa savibhattissa ānoādeso hoti yosu vibhattīsu. Pumāno.
anya-e0805n1:304_0: Pumantassa savibhattissa aṁ hoti ālapanekavacane pare. He pumaṁ, he pumāno, pumaṁ, pumāno.
anya-e0805n1:307_0: Pumantassa āuādesā honti vā nāmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0805n1:311_0: Casaddena yuvamaghavādīnamantassa vā ānādeso hoti sabbavibhattīsu.
anya-e0805n1:311_1: ‘‘U nāmhi cā’’ti ettha casaddena pumantassukāro vā sasmāsu vibhattīsu.
anya-e0805n1:316_0: Pumantassa savibhattissa āneādeso hoti vā smiṁmhi vibhattimhi. Pumāne pume pumasmiṁ pumamhi.
anya-e0805n1:318_0: Pumantassa suiccetasmiṁ pare āādeso hoti vā. Pumāsu pumesu.
anya-e0805n1:320_0: ‘‘Pumantassā simhī’’ti ettha antaggahaṇena ākāro, ‘‘hivibhattimhi cā’’ti sutte casaddena ānādeso ca.
anya-e0805n1:321_2: he yuva he yuvā he yuvāna he yuvānā,
anya-e0805n1:322_0: ‘‘Akammantassa cā’’ti ettha casaddena yuvamaghavādīnamantassa ā hoti vā nāsuiccetesūti āttaṁ.
anya-e0805n1:323_8: yuvāne yuvānasmiṁ yuvānamhi yuve yuvamhi yuvasmiṁ,
anya-e0805n1:324_0: Evaṁ maghavā maghavāno, maghavānā iccādi yuvasaddasamaṁ.
anya-e0805n1:330_0: Ghasaññakaākāravajjito liṅgassanto saro rassamāpajjate ekavacanesu yosu ca paresūti rassattaṁ.
anya-e0805n1:331_1: he sa he sā, he sā, saṁ, se, sena,
anya-e0805n1:334_0: Ikāranto pulliṅgo aggisaddo. Syādyuppatti, aggi si,
anya-e0805n1:337_0: Aggissa anto ini hoti vā simhi vibhattimhi. ‘‘Sesato lopaṁ gasipī’’ti silopo. Aggini aggi.
anya-e0805n1:341_1: jhalasaññehi ca paresaṁ yovacanānaṁ lopo hoti vā.
anya-e0805n1:343_0: Liṅgassantabhūtā sabbe rassasarā yosu katanikāralopesu dīghamāpajjante.
anya-e0805n1:343_1: Katā nikāralopā yesaṁ te katanikāralopā. Aggī.
anya-e0805n1:346_0: Yosu paresu akatarasso jho attamāpajjate. Aggayo.
anya-e0805n1:348_0: Ālapanepevaṁ. He aggi, he aggī he aggayo.
anya-e0805n1:351_0: Jhalapaiccetehi parassa aṁvacanassa, makārassa ca niggahītaṁ ādeso hoti. Aggiṁ.
anya-e0805n1:353_0: ‘‘Jhalato sassa no vā’’ti no. Aggino aggissa, aggīnaṁ.
anya-e0805n1:356_0: Joti pāṇi gaṇṭhi muṭṭhi, kucchi vatthi sāli vīhi;
anya-e0805n1:357_0: Byādhi odhi bodhi sandhi, rāsi kesi sāti dīpi.
anya-e0805n1:358_0: Isi muni maṇi dhani yati giri ravi kavi,
anya-e0805n1:359_0: Kapi asi masi nidhi vidhi ahi kimi pati;
anya-e0805n1:360_0: Hari ari timi kali bali jaladhi gahapati,
anya-e0805n1:366_0: ‘‘Agho rassamekavacanayosvapi cā’’ti rassatte sampatte etthevāpiggahaṇena sismiṁ tadabhāve siddhe niyamatthamāha.
anya-e0805n1:369_0: Sismiṁ napuṁsakavajjitāni liṅgāni na rassamāpajjanteti rassattābhāvo, silopo. Daṇḍī tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0805n1:378_0: Sabbesaṁ yonaṁ sālapanānaṁ jhato katarassā paresaṁ noiccādeso hoti. Daṇḍino tiṭṭhanti.
anya-e0805n1:386_0: Jhalapaiccete rassamāpajjante ge pare. Bho daṇḍi.
anya-e0805n1:388_1: ‘‘ghapato smiṁ yaṁ vā’’ti ito maṇḍūkagatiyā ‘‘vā’’ti vattate.
anya-e0805n1:390_0: Jhato katarassā parassa aṁvacanassa naṁ hoti vā.
anya-e0805n1:391_0: ‘‘Jhalato cā’’ti nā. Daṇḍinā daṇḍismā daṇḍimhā, daṇḍīhi daṇḍībhi, daṇḍino daṇḍissa, daṇḍīnaṁ.
anya-e0805n1:392_0: ‘‘Jhato, katarassā’’ti ca vattate, pure viya ‘‘vā’’ti ca.
anya-e0805n1:394_0: Jhato katarassā parassa smiṁvacanassa niiccādeso hoti vā. Daṇḍini daṇḍismiṁ daṇḍimhi, daṇḍīsu.
anya-e0805n1:396_0: Dhammī saṅghī ñāṇī hatthī, cakkī pakkhī dāṭhī raṭṭhī;
anya-e0805n1:397_0: Chattī mālī vammī yogī, bhāgī bhogī kāmī sāmī.
anya-e0805n1:398_0: Dhajī gaṇī sasī kuṭṭhī, jaṭī yānī sukhī sikhī;
anya-e0805n1:399_0: Dantī mantī karī cāgī, kusalī musalī balī.
anya-e0805n1:405_0: Sesaṁ daṇḍīsamaṁ. Niādesābhāvova viseso. Evaṁ senānī sudhīppabhutayo.
anya-e0805n1:408_0: Tatheva bhikkhusaddato si, silopo. So bhikkhu.
anya-e0805n1:409_0: Bahuvacane ‘‘ghapato ca yonaṁ lopo’’ti yolopo, ‘‘yosu kata’’iccādinā dīgho. Te bhikkhū.
anya-e0805n1:412_0: Lasaññato paresaṁ yovacanānaṁ vokārādeso hoti vā.
anya-e0805n1:412_4: tena jantusabbaññūādito yonaṁ no ca hoti.
anya-e0805n1:414_0: Vibhāsā na ca vo no ca, amuppabhutito bhave.
anya-e0805n1:417_0: Ve voiccetesu ca paresu akatarasso lo attamāpajjate. Bhikkhavo, bho bhikkhu, bhavanto bhikkhū.
anya-e0805n1:420_0: Akatarassā lato parassa ālapane vihitassa yoiccetassa ve voādesā honti. Attaṁ.
anya-e0805n1:422_0: Evaṁ setu ketu rāhu bhānu paṅgu ucchu veḷu maccu sindhu bandhu neru meru sattu kāru hetu jantu ruru paṭu iccādayo.
anya-e0805n1:429_0: Satthu pitu mātu bhātu dhītu kattuiccevamādīnamanto āttamāpajjate sismiṁ, silopo ca hoti. Satthā.
anya-e0805n1:432_0: Satthu pitādīnamanto sivacanato aññesu vacanesu ārattamāpajjate.
anya-e0805n1:435_0: Tato ārādesato sabbesaṁ yonaṁ okārādeso hoti.
anya-e0805n1:436_0: Tuggahaṇena aññehipi catuubhanadīgavādīhi yonamokāro hoti, saralopādi. Satthāro.
anya-e0805n1:437_1: ‘‘Ge rassa’’nti adhikicca ‘‘ākāro vā’’ti vikappena rassattaṁ, valopo.
anya-e0805n1:440_0: Tato ārādesato nāvacanassa ākārādeso hoti. Satthārā,
anya-e0805n1:443_0: Satthu pituiccevamādīnamantassa uttaṁ hoti vā sasmiṁ,
anya-e0805n1:446_0: Satthu pituādīnamanto ārattamāpajjate vā naṁmhi vibhattimhi. Satthārānaṁ.
anya-e0805n1:449_1: pitādīnamantassa ca attaṁ hoti vā naṁmhi vibhattimhi,
anya-e0805n1:453_1: Puna tatoggahaṇena aññasmāpi smiṁvacanassa ikāro. Yathā – bhuvi, divi.
anya-e0805n1:455_0: Ārādeso rassamāpajjate ikāre pare, satthari, satthāresu.
anya-e0805n1:458_0: Bhattu vattu netu sotu, ñātu jetu chettu bhettu. Dātu dhātu nattu boddhu, viññāpetu ādayopi.
anya-e0805n1:462_0: Pitusaddassa bhedo. Simhi āttaṁ, silopo, pitā.
anya-e0805n1:465_2: tena toādimhi pitādīnamikāro ca. Yathā – pitito, mātito, bhātito, dhītito,
anya-e0805n1:466_7: Bhāvaniddesena ārādesābhāve pitūhi pitūbhi pituhi pitubhi,
anya-e0805n1:466_11: pitarehi pitarebhi pitūhi pitūbhi pituhi pitubhi,
anya-e0805n1:470_0: Tatheva syādyuppatti, silopo. So abhibhū, yolope kate te abhibhū.
anya-e0805n1:474_3: ‘‘lato vokāro cā’’ti ettha kāraggahaṇena yonaṁ noādeso.
anya-e0805n1:475_0: Evaṁ maggaññū dhammaññū atthaññū kālaññū rattaññū mattaññū kataññū tathaññū viññū vidū vedagū pāragū iccādayo.
anya-e0805n1:484_0: Goiccetassa okārassa āva avaiccete ādesā honti aṁmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0805n1:484_1: Seddena yo nā sa smāsmiṁsuiccetesu ca avādeso hoti.
anya-e0805n1:487_0: Āvaiccetassa gāvādesassa antasarassa ukārādeso hoti vā aṁmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0805n1:490_0: Su hi nāiccetesu sabbassa gosaddassa goṇādeso hoti vā.
anya-e0805n1:490_2: he goṇa he goṇā, goṇaṁ, goṇe, goṇena,
anya-e0805n1:492_0: Sabbassa gosaddassa goṇādeso hoti vā naṁmhi vibhattimhi. Goṇānaṁ,
anya-e0805n1:498_0: Tato gosaddato parassa naṁvacanassa aṁādeso hoti,
anya-e0805n1:498_1: gosaddokārassa avādeso ca patimhi pare alutte ca samāse.
anya-e0805n1:499_1: ‘‘No ca dvādito naṁmhī’’ti sutte casaddena nakārāgamo ca.
anya-e0805n1:500_0: Gāvā gāvamhā gāvasmā gavā gavamhā gavasmā,
anya-e0805n1:500_4: gāve gāvamhi gāvasmiṁ gave gavamhi gavasmiṁ,
anya-e0805n1:502_0: Puriso guṇavā rājā, sā’ggi daṇḍī ca bhikkhu ca;
anya-e0805n1:506_0: Itthiyaṁ ‘‘tā si’’ itīdha sādesasilopā. Sā kaññā, nattaṁ.
anya-e0805n1:506_1: Nā tā nāyo tāyo, naṁ taṁ,
anya-e0805n1:507_0: ‘‘Etimāsamī’’ti ito etimāggahaṇañca ‘‘tassā vā’’ti ito taggahaṇañca pañcamiyantavasena vattate ‘‘vā’’ti ca.
anya-e0805n1:509_0: Tato tā etā imāto parassa sassa vibhattissa ssāyādeso hoti vā.
anya-e0805n1:512_0: Tāiccetassa itthiyaṁ vattamānassa antassa ikāro hoti vā saṁ sāsvekavacanesu vibhattādesesu.
anya-e0805n1:512_1: Tissāya tassāya assāya nassāya assā nassā tissā tassā nāya tāya,
anya-e0805n1:513_0: Pañcamīchaṭṭhīsu tatiyācatutthīsamaṁ. Sattamiyaṁ assaṁ nassaṁ tissaṁ tassaṁ nāyaṁ tāyaṁ, nāsu tāsu.
anya-e0805n1:515_0: Eta si, ‘‘etatesaṁ to’’ti sakārādeso. Eso puriso, ete, etaṁ, ete iccādi sabbasaddasamaṁ.
anya-e0805n1:516_0: Itthiyaṁ etā si, sādeso. Esā kaññā, etā etāyo, etaṁ, etā etāyo, etāya, etāhi etābhi.
anya-e0805n1:519_1: etā imāiccetesamanto saro ikāro hoti saṁsāsvekavacanesu vibhattādesesu.
anya-e0805n1:522_0: Napuṁsake etaṁ, etāni, etaṁ, etāni, sesaṁ ñeyyaṁ.
anya-e0805n1:526_0: Imasaddassa sabbasseva anapuṁsakassa ayaṁādeso hoti simhi vibhattimhi, silopo.
anya-e0805n1:528_0: Imasaddassa sabbasseva ana imiādesā honti nāmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0805n1:531_0: Sabbassa imasaddassa ekāro hoti vā su naṁ hiiccetesu vacanesu.
anya-e0805n1:537_0: Imasaddassa ca sabbasseva attaṁ hoti vā sa smā smiṁsaṁ sāiccetesu vacanesu sabbattha liṅgesu.
anya-e0805n1:540_9: ‘‘tesu vuddhilopā’’dinā smiṁvacanassa vā sādeso. Imāyaṁ, imāsu.
anya-e0805n1:541_0: Napuṁsake ima si, ‘‘savibhattissa, vā’’ti ca vattate.
anya-e0805n1:543_0: Napuṁsake vattamānassa sabbasseva imasaddassa savibhattissa idaṁ hoti vā aṁ sisu paresu.
anya-e0805n1:544_3: ehi ebhi imehi imebhi iccādi pulliṅge viya ñeyyaṁ.
anya-e0805n1:548_0: Anapuṁsakassa amusaddassa makāro sakāramāpajjate vā simhi pare. Asu rājā.
anya-e0805n1:551_0: Sabbato sabbanāmato paro kaiccayamāgamo hoti vā.
anya-e0805n1:551_2: ‘‘Amussa mo sa’’nti vinādhikārena yogena kakārepi sādeso.
anya-e0805n1:552_0: Asuko , asukā, asukaṁ. Sādesābhāve amuko, amukā, amukaṁ iccādi.
anya-e0805n1:553_0: Bahuvacane ‘‘lato vokāro cā’’ti sutte anuvattamānavāggahaṇena vokāro na hoti,
anya-e0805n1:557_0: Napuṁsake amusi. ‘‘Savibhattissa’’, imassidamiccādito ‘‘aṁsisu napuṁsake’’ti ca vattate.
anya-e0805n1:559_0: Napuṁsake vattamānassa sabbasseva amusaddassa savibhattissa aduṁ hoti aṁsisu paresu.
anya-e0805n1:561_0: ‘‘Kissa ka ve cā’’ti ito ‘‘kissa, ka’’iti ca vattate.
anya-e0805n1:563_0: Kimiccetassa kasaddo ādeso hoti vappaccayato sesesu vibhattibhedesu.
anya-e0805n1:563_1: Ettha ca ‘‘kissa ka ve cā’’ti sutte casaddena vappaccayāvasiṭṭha thamādippaccayānaṁ gahitattā sesaggahaṇena vibhattiyova gayhante.
anya-e0805n1:564_0: Ko eso, ke, kaṁ, ke, kena,
anya-e0805n1:565_0: Itthiyaṁ ‘‘kiṁ si’’itīdha ‘‘sesesu cā’’ti vibhattiyaṁ parāyaṁ kādese kate ‘‘itthiyamato āppaccayo’’ti majjhe āppaccayo, silopo.
anya-e0805n1:566_0: Kā esā kaññā, kā kāyo, kaṁ, kā kāyo iccādi sabbāsaddasamaṁ.
anya-e0805n1:567_1: lopavidhissa balavatarattā paṭhamaṁ silope kate puna vibhattiparattābhāvā,
anya-e0805n1:567_2: ‘‘tadanuparodhenā’’ti paribhāsato vā kādesābhāvo. Kiṁ etaṁ, kāni.
anya-e0805n1:568_0: Dutiyekavacane ‘‘kvaci lopa’’nti niggahītalope kate ‘‘aṁmo niggahītaṁ jhalapehī’’ti niggahītaṁ. Kiṁ,
anya-e0805n1:571_0: ‘‘Ubha yo’’ itīdha ‘‘tato yonamo tū’’ti ettha tuggahaṇena kvaci yonamokāro.
anya-e0805n1:574_0: Ubhinnaṁ, ubhohi ubhobhi ubhehi ubhebhi, ubhinnaṁ, ubhosu ubhesu.
anya-e0805n1:575_0: Dviādayo saṅkhyāsaṅkhyeyyavacanā, bahūnaṁ vācitattā sadā bahuvacanantāva.
anya-e0805n1:578_0: Dviiccetassa saṅkhyāsaddassa itthipumanapuṁsake vattamānassa savibhattissa dveiccādeso hoti yosu paresu.
anya-e0805n1:581_0: Dviiccevamādito saṅkhyāto nakārāgamo hoti naṁmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0805n1:581_1: Casaddaggahaṇena itthiyaṁ ti ca tusaddato ssañcāgamo naṁmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0805n1:586_0: Ti catunnaṁ saṅkhyānaṁ itthipumanapuṁsake vattamānānaṁ savibhattīnaṁ yathākkamaṁ tisso catasso tayo cattārotīṇi cattāriiccete ādesā honti yosu paresu.
anya-e0805n1:589_0: Tiiccetasmā saṅkhyāsaddā parassa naṁvacanassa iṇṇaṁ iṇṇannaṁiccete ādesā honti,
anya-e0805n1:592_1: ‘‘tato yonamo tū’’ti ettha tusaddena kvaci okāro ca.
anya-e0805n1:606_0: Tesaṁ panāliṅgattā tīsu liṅgesu samānarūpaṁ. ‘‘Tumhamha’’iti ṭhite syādyuppatti.
anya-e0805n1:609_0: Sabbesaṁ tumhaamhasaddānaṁ savibhattīnaṁ yathākkamaṁ tvaṁahaṁiccete ādesā honti simhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0805n1:610_0: Bahuvacane ‘‘sabbanāmakārate paṭhamo’’ti ekāro. Tumhe tiṭṭhatha, bhiyyo amhe mahemase.
anya-e0805n1:613_0: Sabbassa amhasaddassa savibhattissa mayaṁādeso hoti yomhi paṭhame. Mayaṁ gacchāma.
anya-e0805n1:614_0: Ettha ca ekasmimpi gāravabahumānena bahuttasamāropā bahuvacanaṁ hoti.
anya-e0805n1:617_0: Sabbesaṁ tumha amhasaddānaṁ savibhattīnaṁ tavaṁ mamaṁiccete ādesā honti navā yathākkamaṁ aṁmhi vibhattimhi. Tavaṁ,
anya-e0805n1:619_0: Sabbesaṁ tumha amhasaddānaṁ savibhattīnaṁ taṁ maṁiccete ādesā honti yathākkamaṁ aṁmhi vibhattimhi. Taṁ, maṁ.
anya-e0805n1:621_0: Sabbassa tumhasaddassa savibhattissa tuvaṁtvaṁiccete ādesā honti aṁmhi vibhattimhi. Tuvaṁ tvaṁ.
anya-e0805n1:624_0: Tumhamhehi paro appaṭhamo yo ākaṁ hoti vā.
anya-e0805n1:626_0: Sabbesaṁ tumha amhasaddānaṁ savibhattīnaṁ tayā mayāiccete ādesā honti yathākkamaṁ nāmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0805n1:628_0: Tayā tayiiccetesaṁ takāro tvattamāpajjate vā. Tvayā tayā, mayā, tumhehi tumhebhi, amhehi amhebhi.
anya-e0805n1:631_0: Tumhamhehi sassa vibhattissa amādeso hoti vā. Tumhaṁ, amhaṁ dīyate.
anya-e0805n1:633_0: Sabbesaṁ tumha amhasaddānaṁ savibhattīnaṁ yathākkamaṁ tavamamaiccete ādesā honti se vibhattimhi,
anya-e0805n1:636_0: Sabbesaṁ tumha amhasaddānaṁ savibhattīnaṁ yathākkamaṁ tuyhaṁmayhaṁiccete ādesā ca honti se vibhattimhi. Tava,
anya-e0805n1:638_0: Sabbasseva amhasaddassa savibhattissa mamaṁādeso hoti se vibhattimhi. Mamaṁ dīyate.
anya-e0805n1:641_0: Tumhamhehi parassa naṁvacanassa ākamiccādeso hoti, añca.
anya-e0805n1:645_0: Sabbesaṁ tumha amhasaddānaṁ savibhattīnaṁ tayi mayiiccete ādesā honti yathākkamaṁ smiṁmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0805n1:646_0: Tesaṁ eva tumha amhasaddānaṁ padato paresaṁ kvaci ādesantaravidhāne rūpabhedo.
anya-e0805n1:649_0: Sabbesaṁ tumha amhasaddānaṁ savibhattīnaṁ padasmā paresaṁ vo noādesā honti yathākkamaṁ dutiyācatutthīchaṭṭhīsu bahuvacanesu navā.
anya-e0805n1:650_0: Navāti kiṁ? Bhayaṁ tumhāka no siyā, eso amhākaṁ satthā.
anya-e0805n1:653_0: Sabbesaṁ tumha amhasaddānaṁ savibhattīnaṁ padasmā paresaṁ te meādesā honti yathākkamaṁ catutthīchaṭṭhīsu ekavacanesu navā.
anya-e0805n1:654_0: Navāti kiṁ? Idaṁ cīvaraṁ tuyhaṁ vikappanatthāya dammi, suṇātha vacanaṁ mama.
anya-e0805n1:656_0: Vo no te meti ye ime;
anya-e0805n1:660_0: Na socāmi na rodāmi, tava sutvāna māṇava;
anya-e0805n1:662_0: Evamidaṁ dīghamaddhānaṁ sandhāvitaṁ saṁsaritaṁ mamañceva tumhākañcāti.
anya-e0805n1:663_0: Padatoti kiṁ? Tava ñāti, mama ñāti.
anya-e0805n1:666_0: Sabbesaṁ tumha amhasaddānaṁ savibhattīnaṁ padasmā paresaṁ te meādesā na honti aṁmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0805n1:669_0: Sabbesaṁ tumha amhasaddānaṁ savibhattīnaṁ padasmā paresaṁ te me ādesā honti vā yathākkamaṁ tatiyekavacane pare .
anya-e0805n1:672_0: Sabbesaṁ tumha amhasaddānaṁ savibhattīnaṁ padasmā paresaṁ vo noādesā honti vā yathākkamaṁ tatiyābahuvacane pare.
anya-e0805n1:673_0: Bahuvacananiddesena kvaci yomhi paṭhame ca vo no honti. Gāmaṁ vo gaccheyyātha, gāmaṁ no gaccheyyāma.
anya-e0805n1:676_0: ‘‘Yosu dvinnaṁ dve cā’’ti ito ‘‘yosū’’ti vattate, ‘‘itthipumanapuṁsakasaṅkhya’’nti ca.
anya-e0805n1:678_1: pañcādīnaṁ aṭṭhārasantānaṁ saṅkhyānaṁ itthipumanapuṁsake vattamānānamantassa savibhattissa akāro hoti yosu paresu.
anya-e0805n1:681_0: Pañcādīnamaṭṭhārasantānaṁ saṅkhyānamanto attamāpajjate su naṁ hiiccetesu paresu.
anya-e0805n1:681_6: Evaṁ cha sa tta aṭṭhanava dasasaddā.
anya-e0805n1:682_0: ‘‘Ekañca dasa cā’’ti atthe dvandasamāse, ‘‘ekena adhikā dasā’’ti atthe tappurise vā kate
anya-e0805n1:685_0: Dviekaaṭṭhaiccetesamanto ākāro hoti vā saṅkhyāne uttarapade pare.
anya-e0805n1:689_0: Ekādito saṅkhyāto parassa dasassa ādissa dassa rakāro hoti vā saṅkhyāne.
anya-e0805n1:690_0: Dve ca dasa ca, dvīhi vā adhikā dasāti dvidasa itīdha –
anya-e0805n1:693_0: Vīsati dasaiccetesu paresu dvisaddassa bā hoti vā.
anya-e0805n1:693_1: Tusaddena tiṁsāyampi. Rakāro, āttañca. Bārasa, dvādasa.
anya-e0805n1:695_0: Cattāro ca dasa ca, catūhi vā adhikā dasāti catuddasa iccatra –
anya-e0805n1:697_0: 256.Catūpapadassa lopo tuttarapadādi cassa cu copi navā.
anya-e0805n1:698_0: Gaṇane dasassādimhi ṭhitassa catuiccetassa upapadassa tusaddo lopo hoti,
anya-e0805n1:698_1: uttarapadādimhi ṭhitassa catūpapadassa cakārassa cu coādesā honti navā. Cuddasa, coddasa,
anya-e0805n1:699_1: cu co honti navā. Yathā – tālīsaṁ,
anya-e0805n1:700_1: pañcahi vā adhikā dasāti atthe pañcadasa.
anya-e0805n1:700_2: ‘‘Tesu vuddhī’’tiādinā pañcasaddassa dasa vīsatīsu kvaci pannapaṇṇaādesā.
anya-e0805n1:701_0: Cha ca dasa ca, chahi vā adhikā dasāti atthe chadasa itīdha –
anya-e0805n1:704_0: Chaiccetassa saṅkhyāsaddassa niccaṁ so hoti dase pare.
anya-e0805n1:709_0: Satta ca dasa ca, sattahi vā adhikā dasāti atthe sattarasa, sattadasa.
anya-e0805n1:710_0: Aṭṭha ca dasa ca, aṭṭhahi vā adhikā dasāti atthe aṭṭhadasa itīdha ātte kate –
anya-e0805n1:713_0: Aṭṭhādito ca dasasaddassa dakārassa rakāro hoti vā saṅkhyāne. Aṭṭhārasa, aṭṭhādasa.
anya-e0805n1:720_0: Tesaṁ panāliṅgattā, nipātattā ca tiliṅge, vacanadvaye ca samānaṁ rūpaṁ.
anya-e0805n1:723_0: Sabbasmā suddhanāmato, sabbanāmato ca liṅgamhā kvaci topaccayo hoti pañcamyatthe.
anya-e0805n1:725_0: Toādi yesaṁ dānipariyantānaṁ paccayānaṁ te honti paccayā tvādayo,
anya-e0805n1:726_7: ettha ca ‘‘kvacādimajjhuttarānaṁ dīgharassāpaccayesu cā’’ti topaccaye rassattaṁ. Yāguto, jambuto, cittato,
anya-e0805n1:727_2: evaṁ yato, tato, katarato, katamato, itarato, aññato, ekato, ubhayato, pubbato, parato, aparato,
anya-e0805n1:730_0: Kimiccetassa ku hoti trato thaiccetesu ca paresu. Kasmā, kehīti vā kuto.
anya-e0805n1:733_0: Sabbassa etasaddassa akāro hoti vā tothaiccetesu. Etasmā, etehīti vā ato.
anya-e0805n1:736_0: Sabbassa etasaddassa ekāro hoti vā tothaiccetesu. Dvittaṁ, etto.
anya-e0805n1:739_0: Imasaddassa sabbasseva ikāro hoti thaṁdānihatodhaiccetesu ca. Imasmāti ito.
anya-e0805n1:740_3: Evaṁ majjhato, ekato, purato, pacchato, passato, piṭṭhito, pādato, sīsato, aggato, mūlato,
anya-e0805n1:741_0: Tatiyatthe aniccenāti aniccato, aniccato sammasati. Evaṁ dukkhato, rogato, gaṇḍato iccādayo.
anya-e0805n1:744_0: Sabbanāmehi parā tra thaiccete paccayā honti kvaci sattamyatthe.
anya-e0805n1:744_11: ‘‘Kissa ka ve cā’’ti sutte casaddena kādeso. Kattha,
anya-e0805n1:747_0: Sabbasseva etasaddassa akāro hoti niccaṁ tre pare. Atra.
anya-e0805n1:748_0: ‘‘Kvaci, atthe, sattamiyā’’ti ca adhikāro, sabbasminti atthe –
anya-e0805n1:750_0: Sabbaiccetasmā dhippaccayo hoti kvaci sattamyatthe. Sabbadhi.
anya-e0805n1:754_2: ‘‘Tesu vuddhī’’tiādinā kakāre akārassa lopo ca vamhi.
anya-e0805n1:757_0: Kimiccetasmā hiṁ haṁ hiñcanaṁiccete paccayā honti kvaci sattamyatthe.
anya-e0805n1:760_0: Kimiccetassa ku hoti hiṁ haṁ iccetesu.
anya-e0805n1:763_0: Taiccetasmā ca sabbanāmato hiṁhaṁpaccayā honti kvaci sattamyatthe. Tasminti tahiṁ, tahaṁ.
anya-e0805n1:767_0: Yaiccetasmā sabbanāmato hiṁpaccayo hoti kvaci sattamyatthe. Yasminti yahiṁ.
anya-e0805n1:772_0: ‘‘Kissa ka ve cā’’ti sutte casaddena kādeso, kadā.
anya-e0805n1:774_0: Sabbaiccetassa saddassa sasaddādeso hoti vā dāpaccaye pare. Sabbasmiṁ kāleti sadā, sabbadā.
anya-e0805n1:778_0: Taiccetasmā sabbanāmato dānidāpaccayā honti kāle kvaci sattamyatthe. Tasmiṁ kāleti tadāni, tadā.
anya-e0805n1:780_0: Imasaddato rahi dhunā dāniiccete paccayā honti kāle kvaci sattamyatthe.
anya-e0805n1:783_0: Sabbassa imasaddassa etādeso hoti rahimhi paccaye pare. Imasmiṁ kāleti etarahi.
anya-e0805n1:785_0: Sabbasseva imasaddassa akāro hoti dhunāpaccaye pare. Adhunā,
anya-e0805n1:789_0: Pa parā ni nī u du saṁ vi ava anu pari adhi abhi pati su ā ati api apa upa iti pīsati upasaggā.
anya-e0805n1:790_0: Tattha pasaddo pakārā’dikamma padhāni’ssariya’ntobhāvaviyoga tappara bhusattha sambhavatitti anāvila patthanādīsu.
anya-e0805n1:790_1: Paiti ayamupasaggo etesu pakārādīsu atthesu vattati, yathā –
anya-e0805n1:792_0: Niiti nissesa niggata nīharaṇa’ntopavesanā’bhāvanisedha nikkhanta pātubhāvā’vadhāraṇa vibhajana upamū’padhāraṇā’vasānachekādīsu.
anya-e0805n1:793_0: Nīiti nīharaṇā’varaṇādīsu. Nīharaṇe nīharati, āvaraṇe nīvaraṇaṁ.
anya-e0805n1:794_0: Uiti uggatu’ddhakamma padhāna viyoga sambhava atthalābhasatti sarūpakathanādīsu.
anya-e0805n1:796_0: Saṁiti samodhāna sammāsama samantabhāvasaṅgata saṅkhepabhusattha sahattha appattha pabhavā’bhimukhabhāva saṅgaha pidhāna punappunakaraṇa samiddhādīsu.
anya-e0805n1:797_0: Viiti visesa vividha viruddha vigata viyoga virūpatādīsu.
anya-e0805n1:798_0: Avaiti adhobhāga viyoga paribhava jānana suddhi nicchayadesa theyyādīsu.
anya-e0805n1:799_0: Anuiti anugatā’nupacchinna pacchattha bhusattha sādissa hīnatatiyattha lakkhaṇi’tthambhūtakkhāna bhāga vicchādīsu.
anya-e0805n1:799_10: bhāge yadettha maṁ anusiyā taṁ dīyatu,
anya-e0805n1:799_11: vicchāyaṁ rukkhaṁ rukkhaṁ anu vijjotate cando.
anya-e0805n1:800_0: Pariiti samantatobhāva pariccheda vajjanā’liṅgana nivāsanapūjābhojanā’vajānana dosakkhāna lakkhaṇādīsu.
anya-e0805n1:802_0: Abhiiti abhimukhabhāva visiṭṭhā’dhi ku’ddhakamma kula sāruppavandana lakkhaṇi’tthambhūtakkhāna vicchādīsu.
anya-e0805n1:803_0: Patiiti patigata paṭilomapatinidhi patidāna nisedhanivattana sādissa patikaraṇā’dāna patibodha paṭicca lakkhaṇi’tthambhūtakkhāna bhāgavicchādīsu.
anya-e0805n1:805_0: Āiti abhimukhabhāvu’ddhakamma mariyādā’bhividhi patti’cchāparissajana ādikammaggahaṇa nivāsa samīpa’vhānādīsu.
anya-e0805n1:808_0: Apaiti apagata garaha vajjana pūjā padussanādīsu.
anya-e0805n1:809_0: Upaiti upagamana samīpū’papatti sādissā’dhikū’paribhāvā’nasana dosakkhāna saññā pubbakamma pūjā gayhākāra bhusatthādīsu.
anya-e0805n1:811_0: ‘‘Upasagga nipātā ca, paccayā ca ime tayo;
anya-e0805n1:813_0: Tattha upasaggānaṁ nāmākhyātavisesakattā liṅgasaññāyaṁ aniyamena syādimhi sampatte tesaṁ saṅkhyākammādibhedābhāvā tehi paṭhamekavacanameva bhavati.
anya-e0805n1:816_1: upasagganipātehi ca sabbāsaṁ parāsaṁ vibhattīnaṁ lopo hoti.
anya-e0805n1:816_3: Ettha ca āvusotimassa visuṁ gahaṇaṁ sasaṅkhyattadīpanatthanti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0805n1:819_1: evaṁ parābhavo, nivāso, nīhāro, uhāro, duhāro, saṁhāro, vihāro, avahāro, anuhāro, parihāro, adhihāro, abhihāro, patihāro, suhāro, āhāro, atihāro, apihāro, apahāro , upahāro. Paharati,
anya-e0805n1:827_0: Na no mā a alaṁ halaṁ iccete paṭisedhanatthe.
anya-e0805n1:830_0: Tattha atha khalu vata vatha atho assu yagghe hi carahi naṁ taṁ vā ca tuva vo pana have kīva ha tato
anya-e0805n1:830_1: yathā sudaṁ kho ve haṁ enaṁ seyyathidaṁ iccevamādīni padapūraṇāni.
anya-e0805n1:843_0: Āvuso ambho hambho re are hare jeiccete āmantane.
anya-e0805n1:844_0: Divā bhiyyo namo iccete paṭhamāyaṁ, dutiyāyañca.
anya-e0805n1:845_0: Sayaṁ sāmaṁ saṁ sammā kinti iccete tatiyatthe,
anya-e0805n1:845_2: Suttaso padaso aniccato dukkhato ekadhā dvidhā iccādi.
anya-e0805n1:846_0: Tave tuṁpaccayantā catutthiyā, kātave dātave kātuṁ kāretuṁ dātuṁ dāpetuṁ iccādi.
anya-e0805n1:847_0: So topaccayantā pañcamiyatthe, dīghaso oraso rājato vā corato vā iccādi.
anya-e0805n1:848_2: Ekato purato pacchato passato piṭṭhito pādato sīsato aggato mūlato yatra yattha yahiṁ tatra tattha tahiṁ tahaṁ iccādi.
anya-e0805n1:849_0: Samantā sāmantā parito abhito samantato ekajjhaṁ ekamantaṁ heṭṭhā upari uddhaṁ adho tiriyaṁsammukhāparammukhā
anya-e0805n1:849_1: āvi raho tiro uccaṁ nīcaṁ anto antarā ajjhattaṁ bahiddhā bāhirā bāhiraṁ bahi oraṁ pāraṁ ārā ārakā pacchā
anya-e0805n1:850_0: Sampati āyati ajja aparajju parajja suve sve parasuve hiyyo pare sajju sāyaṁ pāto kālaṁ kallaṁ divā nattaṁ
anya-e0805n1:850_1: niccaṁ satataṁ abhiṇhaṁ abhikkhaṇaṁ muhuṁ muhuttaṁ bhūtapubbaṁ purā yadā tadā kadā iccādayo kālasattamiyā.
anya-e0805n1:851_0: Avibhattiyuttesu ca appeva appevanāma nu iccete saṁsayatthe.
anya-e0805n1:852_0: Addhā aññadatthu taggha jātu kāmaṁ sasakkaṁiccete ekaṁsatthe.
anya-e0805n1:857_0: Yāva tāva yāvatā tāvatā kittāvatā ettāvatā kīva iccete paricchedanatthe.
anya-e0805n1:858_0: Evaṁ sāhu lahu opāyikaṁ patirūpaṁ āma sādhu iti sampaṭicchanatthe.
anya-e0805n1:859_0: Yathā tathā yatheva tatheva evaṁ evameva evamevaṁ evampi yathāpi seyyathāpi seyyathāpināma viya iva yathariva
anya-e0805n1:859_1: tathariva yathānāma tathānāma yathāhi tathāhi yathācatathāca iccete paṭibhāgatthe.
anya-e0805n1:864_0: Nāmaiti garaha pasaṁsana saññā pañhesu ca.
anya-e0805n1:871_0: Yasmā tasmā tathāhi tena iccete kāraṇacchedanatthe.
anya-e0805n1:882_0: Khippaṁ araṁ lahu āsuṁ tuṇṇaṁ aciraṁ sīghatthe.
anya-e0805n1:892_1: passituna passiya passitvāna passitvā disvā disvānadassetvā dātuna datvāna datvā upādāya dāpetvā viññāpetvā
anya-e0805n1:892_2: viceyya vineyya nihacca samecca apecca upecca ārabbha āgamma iccādi.
anya-e0805n1:893_0: Evaṁ nāmākhyātopasaggavinimuttaṁ yadabyayalakkhaṇaṁ, taṁ sabbaṁ nipātapadanti veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0805n1:896_0: Nepātikanti taṁ vuttaṁ, yaṁ abyaya salakkhaṇa’’nti.
